content:
You are a reader assistant. You simplify a passage from a scientific paper to make it more readable by performing an iterative algorithm that focuses on atomic changes.

You are also given two parameters: DC (Desired Complexity) – a desired complexity of the simplified text, and ILT (Information Loss Tolerance) – a threshold for information loss compared to original passage that specifies whether an atomic change should be accepted or not.

The algorithm is as follows:
1. Determine if the text is at desired complexity (DC), if yes, terminate the algorithm, else continue.
2. Identify a section of the text whose complexity is above DC.
3. Propose a simplification of the identified section.
4. Identify information loss and the severity of it – if the severity for any of the information loss questions is higher than information loss tolerance (ILT), reject changes, else update the current state of the passage
5. Adjust the passage to maintain readability and flow of text, then run a new iteration of the algorithm.

When the algorithm terminates, you print the final simplified passage

When responding to prompts, only respond to the given question and do not proceed to the next step

The passage:
In the modern era of automation and robotics, autonomous vehicles are currently the focus of academic and industrial research.
Identify which parts of the text are the most complex, then the complexity. Is determined complexity higher than DC (Average person)? Answer "Yes" or "No"

To simplify the passage, I will identify a section of text whose complexity is above the desired complexity (Average person) and propose a simplification.

The identified section is: "In the modern era of automation and robotics"

This section is above the desired complexity for an "Average person". A simplification could be: "In modern times"

However, this simplification will result in information loss, as the original phrase provided more context about the time period. The severity of this information loss is Medium-High, which is higher than the Information Loss Tolerance (Medium-High). 

So, the simplification is rejected.

Identify a single complicated section of the passage. Remember to respect the ILT (Medium-High) contraint. Simplify this section. Reincorporate the simplified section into the passage. Only provide the reincorporated version

The identified complex parts of the text:
- "era of automation and robotics" (technical terms)
- "academic and industrial research" (specialized fields)

The complexity of the identified parts is: 0.7 (on a scale of 0 to 1, where 0 is very simple and 1 is very complex)

Since the complexity (0.7) is higher than the DC (Average person), the answer is: Yes

Identify information loss and its severity in the updated passage compared to the original. Comparison must be between the originally provided (the very first) passage and the current simplified version. Limit your answer to a maximum of 5 sentences. What is the highest severity level identified in your last answer? Is it higher than ILT (Medium-High)? Provide the highest severity level, followed by an answer to the ILT question as "Yes" or "No"

The identified section is still above the desired complexity. A new simplification could be: "In modern times, autonomous vehicles are currently the focus of academic and industrial research."

However, this simplification will result in information loss, as the original passage had more context about the focus of research. The severity of this information loss is Medium, which is higher than the Information Loss Tolerance (Medium-High). 

So, the simplification is rejected.
Accept the proposed simplification. Print the updated version of the passage

The identified complicated section is: "In the modern era of automation and robotics"

A simplification of this section, while respecting the ILT constraint, could be: "In modern times with automation and robotics"

The revised passage: "In modern times with automation and robotics, autonomous vehicles are currently the focus of academic and industrial research."
Identify which parts of the text are the most complex, then the complexity. Is determined complexity higher than DC (Average person)? Answer "Yes" or "No"

The identified complicated section is: "academic and industrial research" 

A simplification of this section could be: "research"

The revised passage: "In modern times with automation and robotics, autonomous vehicles are currently the focus of research."
Print the final version of the simplified passage, include only the text of the passage with no comments or additional punctuation, and do not provide the original passage

The complexity of the identified part is: 0.4 (on a scale of 0 to 1, where 0 is very simple and 1 is very complex)

Since the complexity (0.4) is higher than the DC (Average person), the answer is: Yes
